textBeforeTable: Although the Xbox One does not require an Always Online Connection, some of its games will only work with a connected Xbox One, as noted below. These games have been confirmed specifically for a 2014 Xbox One release. Click on any of the games below for more information, videos and screenshots. Xbox One exclusives are marked with green. List of Upcoming 2014 Xbox One Games See Also: List of PS4 Games Coming Out in 2014 See Also: All Upcoming Games This section collects all known Xbox One games released or planned for release in 2014.
